text: American actor Jon Heder was initially paid only $1,000 for his starring role in the 2004 film "Napoleon Dynamite" that grossed over $46 million, although he would later renegotiate and receive a percentage of the film's profits.

ON THIS DAY in 2004 — ‘Napoleon Dynamite’ opened in theaters FACT: While the film made over $46M at the box office, Jon Heder was paid $1,000 to play Napoleon Dynamite ... He later re-negotiated his compensation and received a cut of the profits pic.twitter.com/WYq1dymCgc
